languages.text: {n}Иокаста хватает вокс-уловитель и рявкает.{/n} "Всем блюстителям — облачиться в полное снаряжение, распределиться по отсекам, поддерживать дисциплину любой ценой. Если кто-то посмеет отвлекать Гильдию Инфернус от аварийных работ — расстреливать. Запись приказа — на сервочерепа и срочно распространить по палубам".

{n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста хватает вокс-уловитель и рявкает.{/n} "Всем блюстителям — облачиться в полное снаряжение, распределиться по отсекам, поддерживать дисциплину любой ценой. Если кто-то посмеет отвлекать Гильдию Инфернус от аварийных работ — расстреливать. Запись приказа — на сервочерепа и срочно распространить по палубам".

If anyone dares distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record the order, hand it to the servo-skulls and distribute across the decks right now."

If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback agarra el voco amplificador y gruñe:{/n} «El personal de seguridad debe ponerse el equipo completo, dispersarse por los compartimentos y mantener la disciplina a cualquier precio. Si alguien se atreve a distraer al gremio Infernus de su labor de emergencia, abran fuego. Registren la orden, entréguenla a los servocráneos y distribúyanla por las cubiertas. Ya».
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback agarra el voco amplificador y gruñe:{/n} «El personal de seguridad debe ponerse el equipo completo, dispersarse por los compartimentos y mantener la disciplina a cualquier precio. Si alguien se atreve a distraer al gremio Infernus de su labor de emergencia, abran fuego. Registren la orden, entréguenla a los servocráneos y distribúyanla por las cubiertas. Ya».

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは音声通信送受信装置を掴んで、大声でどなる。{/n}「エンフォーサーは全員、フル装備で区画のあちこちに散らばり、何としても規律を守るのだ。インフェルヌス・ギルドの緊急任務を邪魔する者がいれば、迷わず発砲せよ。この命令を記録し、サーヴォスカルへ渡して、デッキ全体に配布すること。今すぐにだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは音声通信送受信装置を掴んで、大声でどなる。{/n}「エンフォーサーは全員、フル装備で区画のあちこちに散らばり、何としても規律を守るのだ。インフェルヌス・ギルドの緊急任務を邪魔する者がいれば、迷わず発砲せよ。この命令を記録し、サーヴォスカルへ渡して、デッキ全体に配布すること。今すぐにだ」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克一把抓起了通讯器，高声咆哮起来。{/n}“所有执法者注意，全副武装起来，前往各个区域，不惜一切代价维持纪律。如果有人胆敢干扰控火行会的紧急工作，当场枪毙。把这个命令记录下来，转交给伺服头骨，传达到所有甲板。好了，动作快。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克一把抓起了通讯器，高声咆哮起来。{/n}“所有执法者注意，全副武装起来，前往各个区域，不惜一切代价维持纪律。如果有人胆敢干扰控火行会的紧急工作，当场枪毙。把这个命令记录下来，转交给伺服头骨，传达到所有甲板。好了，动作快。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback reißt den Vox-Transmitter an sich und faucht:{/n} "Alle Enforcers vollständige Kampfausrüstung anlegen, in den Modulen ausschwärmen und um jeden Preis die Disziplin aufrechtzuerhalten. Wenn es jemand wagt, die Infernus-Gilde von ihrer Notfallarbeit abzuhalten, erschießt ihn. Zeichnet diesen Befehl auf, gebt ihn an die Servoschädel weiter und verbreitet ihn auf allen Decks. Sofort."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback reißt den Vox-Transmitter an sich und faucht:{/n} "Alle Enforcers vollständige Kampfausrüstung anlegen, in den Modulen ausschwärmen und um jeden Preis die Disziplin aufrechtzuerhalten. Wenn es jemand wagt, die Infernus-Gilde von ihrer Notfallarbeit abzuhalten, erschießt ihn. Zeichnet diesen Befehl auf, gebt ihn an die Servoschädel weiter und verbreitet ihn auf allen Decks. Sofort."

languages.text: {n}Jocasta saisit l'émetteur vox et grogne :{/n} « J'ordonne à tous les prévôts de revêtir leur tenue complète et de se répartir dans les différents compartiments pour y faire régner l'ordre, coûte que coûte. Exécutez quiconque empêche les ouvriers de la guilde infernus d'effectuer les réparations d'urgence. Que cet ordre soit enregistré, remis aux servocrânes et transmis sur tous les ponts. Immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta saisit l'émetteur vox et grogne :{/n} « J'ordonne à tous les prévôts de revêtir leur tenue complète et de se répartir dans les différents compartiments pour y faire régner l'ordre, coûte que coûte. Exécutez quiconque empêche les ouvriers de la guilde infernus d'effectuer les réparations d'urgence. Que cet ordre soit enregistré, remis aux servocrânes et transmis sur tous les ponts. Immédiatement. »

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, voksyayarı alıp hırıltılı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Tüm infazcılar; ekipmanlarını baştan aşağı donanacak, kompartımanlara yayılacak ve ne pahasına olursa olsun disiplini sağlayacak. İtfa Loncası'nı işini yapmaktan alıkoymaya cüret eden olursa vurun. Bu emri kaydedin, hizmeletlere verin ve güvertelere yayın. Derhâl."
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback grabs the vox-caster and snarls,{/n} "All enforcers are to don full gear, spread out among the compartments, and maintain discipline at all costs. If anyone dares to distract the Infernus Guild from their emergency work, shoot them. Record this order, hand it to the servo-skulls, and distribute it across the decks. Now."
